transcript: the best employees tend to always be employed all of the people that you were getting in your business are only people who are responding to ads you're actually missing out on all of the talent and those people also have lots of job inquiries coming to them so then how do you say okay well I'm reaching out to you but now I feel like I have no leverage well you do if you have everything else behind you which is what can I offer you what can I do to make my business and the role you'd have here more attractive to you so that all of a sudden I get you to take a step towards me
